Reviews.Title: Vivitar Very Poor Cameras
Reviews.Author: Honch
Reviews.Content: My wife purchased 2 different models of Vivitar cameras as Christmas presents. One for our 5 year old son and another more expensive model for her mother. I could not believe how poor the image quality was on both of them. I immediately returned the more expensive model. Unfortunately we lost the packaging for our sons and are stuck with it. Now I know that we bought a cheap camera for our son and I did not have high expectations. However the pictures are terrible. Completely pixelated with terrible colors. Just awful. Not even fun to look at. I just can't believe that at this point in time any company is still marketing a camera this poor. Vivitar should be ashamed!

Reviews.Title: bad cameras
Reviews.Author: softball
Reviews.Content: We cannot use these cameras at all. We purchased the cameras for the purpose of taking pictures of completed construction projects. They do not have to be hi quality photos by any means but these cameras wont take clear pictures at all. Please let us know how to send them back to you.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: ralph fuller
Reviews.Content: smaller than I thought it would be fairly hard to operate  many features I did not wantshipping okI do not recommend any product

Reviews.Title: Donald Paul
Reviews.Author: done1957
Reviews.Content: This small camera is great. Cost little, takes great pictures, & is easy to operate. I love it. Took alot of pictures of my grandkids.

Reviews.Title: Starter camera for my granddaughter.
Reviews.Author: Charla Ellis
Reviews.Content: I wanted to give her an inexpensive camera that was real and worked.  This one was extremely cheaply made - very light plastic. It would easily break if dropped.  Also, when you took a photo, the image immediately disappeared and a time-passage indicator filled the screen, so a child would no longer see the image they focused on and wouldn't know that the pic was still processing.Very poor camera!

Reviews.Title: blech
Reviews.Author: leaf
Reviews.Content: Piece of crap.picture is so blurry.my phones camera beats this camera in the ground.but I was the idiot who bought a 30 dollar camera expecting anything more than terrible.

Reviews.Title: Vivitar V5118-BLK-PR 5.1MP Digital Camera with 1.5-Inch TFT LCD (Black)
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: It's ok for what I use it for.  When the flash is on pictures are great, without picfures are granny.

Reviews.Title: Bought as a first camera for grand daughter somewhat disappointed
Reviews.Author: Bob Brindle
Reviews.Content: No flash, but instructions tell how to set flash? Pictures not the sharpest. I will probably wait a few yars until my grand daughter gets older and then buy her a better camera. Camera lacks many features flashpicture stability etc., but fine for teaching the basics, It will get passed down to younger sisters to learn how to use. For a little more money better cameras are available. Shop wisely.

Reviews.Title: its a good cam on the to go
Reviews.Author: sierrah44
Reviews.Content: it works great! the pics are clear the price is good for a cam  its good for teens and older people

Reviews.Title: This is camera sucks.
Reviews.Author: Astor Teufel
Reviews.Content: This is the only digital camera I've ever used that pauses and requires me to "hold steady" when I hit the picture button.  It feels extremely light weight and fragile. The image snaps so slowly if you move after hitting the button, your photos are blurry.  In the age of digital cameras, this should not be an issue. This camera goes through batteries extremely quickly as well.I cannot stress the need to avoid this camera strongly enough.  Do not buy this!

Reviews.Title: Very hard to figure out
Reviews.Author: Tara Amendola
Reviews.Content: This camera is not user friendly.  Gave it to my 10 year old for xmas and it has never been used.Not recommended.

Reviews.Title: fine
Reviews.Author: Jodie luciet
Reviews.Content: yes it was fine it came on time and is a good camera just need to get a memory card for it

Reviews.Title: Terrible pictures
Reviews.Author: Beverly Martiniano
Reviews.Content: I returned it as I could not get a clear picture at all.  The screen was so tiny, I could not encompass a whole picture of anything.  Do not recommend.  However the seller was great about the refund and very prompt with it.  Very happy with the seller but product was bad.

Reviews.Title: crap
Reviews.Author: B. Freeman
Reviews.Content: Just no. Photos are horrible, camera is not worth the money spent. Would have been better to go with a brand KNOWN for cameras.

Reviews.Title: For the price it's worth it
Reviews.Author: Funkacious
Reviews.Content: but the menus are very had to use. I always have to use the flash to get good pics but when I do the pics are high quality.

Reviews.Title: very good camera
Reviews.Author: rccarfreak
Reviews.Content: this camera is very high recommended by me it takes good pictures and videos it has many of buttons for a $36 camera very awsome

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Ross
Reviews.Content: Even for the money a piece of junk.  Using this for a kids camera because she is the only one that doesn't care.

ProductInfo.Features:
1.5-inch LCD display
5.1 megapixel
4x digital zoom
Compatible with SD Cards up to 32 GB
Requires 2 AA batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar 5.1MP Digital Camera 1.5-Inch TFT- Blister (V5118-BLK-PR)
